mapper.insert:
insert into T_MSG_PHONE (CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, OPERATOR, CELLPHONE_NUM, DEVICE_ID, DEVICE_TYPE,BATCH_NO, TASK_NO, PUSH_TIME, STATUS) values
(#{phone.createTime}, #{phone.modifyTime}, #{phone.operator}, #{phone.cellphoneNum}, #{phone.deviceId}, #{phone.deviceType}, #{phone.batchNo}, #{phone.taskNo}, #{phone.pushTime}, #{phone.status})
